name: EditionIndexerLogicV1
description: Edition Indexer Logic Contract. This contract and its functions should be called by the relevant proxy smart contract only. Provides the logic code for publishing and interacting with editions, nested into the Cryptograph Indexer.

functionDecorators.name: init
functionDecorators.description: Init function of the Indexer, starting at index 1. Callable only once after instanciation.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the parent, main indexer.

parameterDecorators.name: _minter
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the minter for this edition.

parameterDecorators.name: _editionSize
parameterDecorators.description: The maximum number of cryptographs in this edition.

functionDecorators.name: init0
functionDecorators.description: Init function of the Indexer, starting at index 0. Callable only once after instanciation.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the parent, main indexer.

parameterDecorators.name: _minter
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the minter for this edition.

parameterDecorators.name: _editionSize
parameterDecorators.description: The maximum number of cryptographs in this edition.

functionDecorators.name: insertACryptograph
functionDecorators.description: Insert a cryptograph in the array and return the new index position. Callable only by the index.

parameterDecorators.name: _cryptograph
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the inserted cryptograph.

parameterDecorators.name: _minter
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the minter for this cryptograph.

returnDecorators.description: The new position in the array.

functionDecorators.name: insertACryptographAt
functionDecorators.description: Insert a cryptograph in the array at a specific position. Callable only by the index. Must be smaller than edition size. HAS A LOOP.

parameterDecorators.name: _cryptograph
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the inserted cryptograph.
